description.p: Like the original but elongated with 512 new objects generated by LUMA GENIE, along with other minor improvements such as rotating coins and a play rate dependent on your coin quantity/value. You can rapid fire silver coins now by holding down left click.
Push the 6 unique Tux figurines into the gold and silver pockets at the end of the pitch before you run out of gold and silver coins! It's always a gamble, and your starting hand is make or break!
Game mechanics that will serve you well to know and use to your advantage.

ul.li: Getting a gold coin in a silver slot rewards you 2x silver coins.
Getting a gold coin in a gold slot rewards you 2x gold coins.
Getting a tux in a slot when you already have the tux gives you 6x gold coins and 6x silver coins.

description.p: Controls: Just move around your mouse and click to release a coin.

ul.li: Left Click = Release coin. (hold to auto-place silver coins)

description.p: There is a command line option that allows you to set the coin deployment speed, but also every time you "lose" a game, the new round will start with a faster deployment speed than the last, just to keep things exciting. ;)
